title: Ticket #3004: Slot type startd attrs
description:
Request from khahn: STARTD_ATTRS, but tied to slot types. For example, you might say something like

SLOT_TYPE_2_ATTR=IS_DATA_TRANSFER_SLOT

ensuring that no matter how you tweaked the configuration in the future, possibly increase or decreasing the number of type 2 slots you have, it will remain correctly advertised.
creator: adesmet
